name: Starmie BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Break Star
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon BREAK. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: Starmie BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
